title: Ted: The Kite Man
creator_credit: David Withers, Csilla Csongvay and ACMI
brief_description: Ted the kite man is a Port Fairy icon. A long time resident, Ted has a kite shop, a big heart, and a contagious philosophy as he encourages kids to explore the winds and the outdoors flying their kites. He and his partner build kites with 3,000 children a year and he believes flying a kite helps you forget all your concerns of the day while participating in this peaceful activity.
